name: Pom Poko
description:
Play as a mischievous tanuki trying to steal the shiny objects from the Gango-ji Temple. As a master of illusion, drum your belly and make pom poko to distract the monks!

This prototype, inspired by the Studio Ghibli's Pom Poko movie, was made by a team of seven people in 7 days.

The Team

Emanuele ArdolinoProducerTom BaasSystem DesignerIbrahim El Amrani AI Designer Mathias Larsen Level DesignerNikoloz SikharulidzeUI DesignerFinn Slutter Audio DesignerPawel TrajdosLevel Designer
